api_base_url.title: API Base URL
api_base_url.description: Base URL for the LLM API server. Default is Ollama at localhost.

api_key.title: API Key
api_key.description: API key for authentication (optional for Ollama, required for OpenAI).

model.title: Model Name
model.description: Name of the LLM model to use.

api_mode.title: API Mode
api_mode.description: API protocol to use: 'ollama' for Ollama's native API, 'openai' for OpenAI-compatible APIs.

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: Controls randomness of LLM output. Lower = more deterministic.

max_tokens.title: Max Tokens
max_tokens.description: Maximum number of tokens in the generated response.

auto_fill_on_new_card.title: Auto-fill on new card
auto_fill_on_new_card.description: Automatically generate content when a new card is added.

delay_between_requests_ms.title: Delay between batch requests (ms)
delay_between_requests_ms.description: Delay in milliseconds between LLM requests during batch processing.

note_type_mappings.title: Note Type Mappings
note_type_mappings.description: Per-note-type configuration for field mappings and prompt templates.
